about_the_game:
This is the Cafe Maid - Classic Edition Demo
Step into the world of the cutest café in this classic idle game!

Serve your guests and grow your café empire with the help of adorable anime maid girls. Even while you're shaving or watching your favorite movies, your maids work tirelessly to earn money for you. Come back and use your earnings to make your café even more successful!

Demo Features:

  • Tutorial & First Café: Play through the tutorial and fully explore the first café.

  • Two Characters: Start with one base character and unlock an additional maid (from 3).

  • Dating Sim Elements: Progress through the first flirty interaction with both characters, unlocking a special 3D scene. Explore a new environment with a free camera to discover more about the girls.

  • Customization:

    • Character Customization: Dress up your maids, customize their outfits, and adjust cloth colors.

    • Furniture Customization: Design and decorate your café with unlockable furniture options.

    • Player Customization: Personalize your in-game avatar, which appears in later scenes in the full game

  • Progression: Enhance maid attributes, complete objectives, and advance through the season pass.Chill Idle Gameplay

A relaxing blend of idle and clicker gameplay, designed to help you unwind. Enjoy focusing on the maid girls and their stories while the café progresses on its own.

The demo company progress ends when the first café becomes sellable. However, you can continue playing a bit with other aspects of the game afterward (flirting, objectives, season pass).

The full game will be fully compatible with your progress in the demo version.

name: Cafe Maid - Classic Edition Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL® Pentium Dual Core G3250
  • Graphics: Any with dx11 support
  • Sound Card: DirectX9c compliant

short_description: Grow your idle business through managing cute maid girls, deploying them in your cafe to serve your guests.
